module.name: assembly_technology
module.keywords: module,bond, assembly, electrical, solder, adhesive, fastener, feature, component, electromechanical, mating condition, material, joint

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the different aspects of how components are joined together to make an assembly. This module defines the information needed to describe the material used in making the physical connections and their typical shape.

inscope.li: bonds between components in an assembly;
bonds based on solder or adhesive;
items within the scope of application module Assembly module design, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1636;
items within the scope of application module Component grouping, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1656;
items within the scope of application module Product identification extension, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1738.
